Main.Description: Click on the buttons below to select the category of commands.
Main.Title: Help

Utilities.title: Help - Utilities
Utilities.description:
For commands, `<>` mean required and `[]` are optional.

`Invites [@user]` - Sends a list of the top 25 invites or a list of the user's invites.
`Botinfo` - Sends an embed with my information.
`Invite` - Sends an embed with buttons to invite me to your servers.
`@me` - If you mention me, I'll reply with the server's prefix.
`Serverinfo` - Sends an embed with the server's information.
`Voting` - You can support me by voting too!
`Userinfo [@user]` - Sends an embed with the user's information. If you don't mention a user, it sends one with your information.
`Poll <question$option 1$option 2$...>` - A poll command that allows between 2 and 10 options separated by '$'. A user can only have one vote.

Modules.title: Help - Modules
Modules.description: Explanation on the modules. Use `settings` to check the server's settings.

fields.name: Improved Pins
fields.value: When a user pins a message, I will send the message to the set pins channel as an embed, together with the files, and unpin it to avoid reaching the pin limit.

fields.name: Message Links
fields.value: When a user sends the link to a message I can access, I will display the contents of the message and its author.

fields.name: Anti-Scam
fields.value: If a user sends a link to a scam registered in my database, I will delete that message.

fields.name: Anti-Ghost Ping
fields.value: Ever wanted to know who was it that mentioned you and deleted the message? If they do, I will send a message with who was mentioned.

footer.text: To change the settings for the modules, please refer to the Admin help page!

Admin.title: Help - Admin
Admin.description:
For commands, `<>` mean required and `[]` are optional.

`Prefix <prefix>` - Changes the bot prefix to an argument between 1 and 10 characters.
`Lang` - To change the bot language.
`Settings` - Displays the server's module settings and allows to disable or enable the moderation modules.
`Purge <number> [@user]` - Deletes the 'number' of messages. If a user is mentioned, it deletes 'number' messages of that user.
`Set <category> <channel>` - Set the channel for suggestions, reports or ImprovedPins.
`Remove <category>` - Removes the channel for suggestions, reports or ImprovedPins.
